Title: TYPO3 Security Misconfiguration in Install Tool Cookie
Description: It has been discovered that cookies created in the Install Tool are not hardened to be submitted only via HTTP. In combination with other vulnerabilities such as cross-site scripting it can lead to hijacking an active and valid session in the Install Tool.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.6.32, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.7.21, all versions starting from 9.0.0 before 9.5.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.6.32 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.7.21 before 9.0.0, all versions starting from 9.5.2
